technicalExperience.description: I played a pivotal role in guiding and mentoring interns and mid-level developers, fostering a collaborative and knowledge-sharing environment within the team. My problem-solving skills were put to the test as I worked on products serving thousands of customers, ensuring robust and scalable solutions. Additionally, I had the privilege of building MVPs for several startup ventures, contributing to their successful launches and growth.

As a Freelance MERN Stack Developer, I honed my skills in React, Node, Express, and MongoDB to deliver exceptional solutions to clients. I excelled as a problem solver, tackling complex challenges and providing innovative solutions. My portfolio included projects for various clients, where I contributed to the development of their products, from inception to deployment.

During my internship as an Android developer, I specialized in Android app development, focusing on a dating app project. I effectively addressed existing issues and enhanced the app's functionality by implementing new features. My contributions were instrumental in improving the overall user experience, and I ensured that these changes were executed successfully. This experience allowed me to gain valuable hands-on knowledge in the field of Android development, making a meaningful impact on the project's success.

During my tenure as an Intern Android Developer, I specialized in Android development, focusing on a shopping app project. I successfully identified and resolved several critical bugs, enhancing the app's overall functionality and performance. My contributions significantly improved the user experience, and I am proud to have executed my responsibilities efficiently, meeting project deadlines and client expectations.
